skill.name: security-management
skill.description: Manage security policies and access controls for Protect surveillance. Monitor access to recordings and system settings to ensure only authorized personnel have appropriate access.
skill.summary: Manage security policies and access controls for Protect surveillance. Monitor access to recordings ...
skill.author: DataKnifeAI

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based skill containing only documentation and workflow guidance. No executable code, network calls, filesystem access, or external commands detected. Pure prompt library for security management workflows.

content.user_title: Manage security policies and access controls
content.value_statement: Surveillance system security requires careful management of access controls and user permissions. This skill provides structured workflows to audit access, review security configurations, and investigate potential security incidents.
actual_capabilities: Review system access controls and user permissions
Verify access to sensitive recordings and events
Manage secure remote access to cameras
limitations: Does not modify system settings or user permissions directly
Requires existing UniFi Protect system access credentials
Cannot investigate incidents on disconnected or offline systems
Limited to read-only access audit and configuration review

use_cases.title: Quarterly Access Audits
use_cases.description: Review all user permissions and access levels across the surveillance system to ensure compliance with security policies.

use_cases.title: Security Configuration Review
use_cases.description: Verify authentication settings, encryption status, and security controls before regulatory compliance assessments.

use_cases.title: Unauthorized Access Investigation
use_cases.description: Investigate authentication failures and review event logs to identify potential security breaches.

prompt_templates.title: List System Users
prompt_templates.prompt: Who has access to the Protect system? Please provide a summary of all users and their permission levels.

prompt_templates.title: Audit Access Controls
prompt_templates.prompt: Audit surveillance system access. Review system configuration, user permissions, recording access controls, and authentication methods.

prompt_templates.title: Verify Security Settings
prompt_templates.prompt: Verify recording access controls and system authentication settings. Report any security concerns or misconfigurations.

prompt_templates.title: Generate Security Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a security configuration report including access control details, user permissions, authentication methods, and recommendations for improvements.

best_practices: Implement role-based access control with minimum necessary permissions
Review and document access policies before making changes
Archive audit logs regularly for compliance and incident investigation
anti_patterns: Granting admin access to all users for convenience
Skipping regular access reviews due to time constraints
Failing to document permission changes or policy exceptions

faq.question: Which UniFi Protect versions are supported?
faq.answer: This skill works with standard UniFi Protect installations. Check your system version for compatibility.

faq.question: What are the usage limits for this skill?
faq.answer: No specific limits exist. Use as needed for security reviews and incident investigations.

faq.question: How does this integrate with my existing tools?
faq.answer: The skill operates through MCP protocols and works alongside your existing surveillance management workflows.

faq.question: Is my access data stored or transmitted?
faq.answer: This skill only reads system information during active sessions. No data is stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: What should I do if access issues persist?
faq.answer: Verify credentials, check network connectivity, and consult UniFi Protect documentation for troubleshooting steps.

faq.question: How does this compare to native UniFi admin tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides structured audit workflows. Native tools offer direct configuration capabilities beyond this scope.
